items.title: nbbaier/hn-notifier: lightweight notification server for hacker news

items.content_html: PiSync Backend is a lightweight, scalable service designed to support PiBook and PiBox devices—portable learning terminals commonly used in low-connectivity environments. When a device regains internet access, it sends a “sync event” containing details such as how many files were synced, any errors encountered, and the measured internet speed.
items.title: yourclown/Pi-Sync:  PiSync Backend is a lightweight, scalable service designed to support PiBook and PiBox devices—portable learning terminals commonly used in low-connectivity environments. When a device regains internet access, it sends a “sync event” containing details such as how many files were synced, any errors encountered, and the measured internet speed.

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.
items.title: thinakaranmanokaran/Package-Helper: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.

items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
items.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
